Class UncaughtExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nilhcem.fakesmtp.core.exception.UncaughtExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public final class UncaughtExceptionHandler
extends Object
implements Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Intercepts every uncaught exception.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Nilhcem
    See Also:
    "http://stuffthathappens.com/blog/2007/10/07/programmers-notebook-uncaught-exception-handlers/"

        public void uncaughtException(Thread t,
